data.title: New Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra: Colors, Price, Reviews
data.meta_description: Order the all-new Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Smartphone now at Verizon. Powered with Galaxy AI, enjoy next-gen features and capabilities.
data.text:
Answer from Verizon Customer Support4 days

Here are some ways to stop pop-ups on a Samsung Galaxy phone: Use the Samsung Internet app Open the app, tap the three lines, select Settings, then Sites and downloads, and toggle on Block pop-ups. You can also download an ad blocker from the Ad blockers menu. Use Safe mode Enter Safe mode, then go to Settings, Apps, and remove any recently installed or updated apps that might be causing the pop-ups. Use Chrome Open the app, tap More to the right of the address bar, then Settings, Permissions, Pop-ups and redirects, and turn off Pop-ups and redirects. ~Maria

Answer from Verizon Customer Support13 days

The purchase/upgrade of the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra would require an active Verizon account/line of cellular service. With such account/line a plan would be needed. Check out our postpaid packages through this link: https://www.verizon.com/plans/unlimited/. For more Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra info, check out our equipment guide: https://www.verizon.com/smartphones/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra/. ~Gilbert
